attributes.action: To provide more in-depth education about women's health in secondary school.
attributes.additional_details: More and more women are diagnosed with conditions such as endometriosis every day and this is not something that is taught in school. With more information and advice being provided earlier on, girls will have a better understanding of what is going on with their bodies and will know when and how they should seek help.
attributes.background: Very basic information is provided during menstruation lessons. I would like more in-depth information to be taught about women's health such as endometriosis, ovarian cysts ovarian cancer.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556574.
